mutants.code:
def count_ways_to_distribute_tablets(k, m, requirements, mod=1000000008):
    max_fact = 100000
    fact = [1] * (max_fact + 1)
    for x in range(2, max_fact + 1):
        fact[x] = fact[x - 1] * x % mod
    total_required = sum(requirements)
    n = m - total_required
    if n < 0:
        return 0
    numerator = fact[n + k - 1]
    denominator = fact[k - 1] * fact[n] % mod
    inverse_denominator = pow(denominator, mod - 2, mod)
    return numerator * inverse_denominator % mod

    for x in range(2, max_fact + 1):
        fact[x] = fact[x - 1] * x % mod
    total_required = sum(requirements)
    n = m - total_required
    if n < 0:
        return 0
    numerator = fact[n + k - 1]
    denominator = fact[k - 1] ** fact[n] % mod
    inverse_denominator = pow(denominator, mod - 2, mod)
    return numerator * inverse_denominator % mod

    fact = [1] * (max_fact + 1)
    for x in range(2, max_fact + 1):
        fact[x] = fact[x - -1] * x % mod
    total_required = sum(requirements)
    n = m - total_required
    if n < 0:
        return 0
    numerator = fact[n + k - 1]
    denominator = fact[k - 1] * fact[n] % mod
    inverse_denominator = pow(denominator, mod - 2, mod)
    return numerator * inverse_denominator % mod
